00026 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00027                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00028 {
00029     if (nrhs<2 || nlhs>1)
00030         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00031 
00032     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00033     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00034     int id = 0;
00035     string method;
00036     if (nrhs>1 && rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[1].isChar()) {
00037         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00038         method = rhs[1].toString();
00039     }
00040     else
00041         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00042 
00043     // Big operation switch
00044     if (method == "new") {
00045         if (nrhs>3  && (nrhs%2)==0) {
00046             int history = rhs[2].toInt();
00047             float varThreshold = rhs[3].toDouble();
00048             bool bShadowDetection=true;
00049             for (int i=4;i<nrhs;i+=2) {
00050                 string key(rhs[i].toString());
00051                 if (key=="BShadowDetection")
00052                     bShadowDetection = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00053                 else
00054                     mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00055             }
00056             obj_[++last_id] = BackgroundSubtractorMOG2(
00057                 history,varThreshold,bShadowDetection);
00058         }
00059         else if (nrhs==2)
00060             obj_[++last_id] = BackgroundSubtractorMOG2();
00061         else
00062             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00063         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00064         return;
00065     }
00066 
00067     BackgroundSubtractorMOG2& obj = obj_[id];
00068     if (method == "delete") {
00069         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00070             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output not assigned");
00071         obj_.erase(id);
00072     }
00073     else if (method == "apply") {
00074         if (nrhs<3 || (nrhs%2)!=1 || nlhs>1)
00075             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00076         double learningRate=0;
00077         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00078             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00079             if (key=="LearningRate")
00080                 learningRate = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00081             else
00082                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00083         }
00084         Mat image(rhs[2].toMat()), fgmask;
00085         obj(image, fgmask, learningRate);
00086         plhs[0] = MxArray(fgmask,mxLOGICAL_CLASS);
00087     }
00088     else if (method == "getBackgroundImage") {
00089         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs>1)
00090             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00091         Mat im;
00092         obj.getBackgroundImage(im);
00093         plhs[0] = MxArray(im);
00094     }
00095     else if (method == "history") {
00096         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00097             obj.set(method, rhs[2].toInt());
00098         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00099             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.get<int>(method));
00100         else
00101             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00102     }
00103     else if (method == "varThreshold") {
00104         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00105             obj.set(method, rhs[2].toDouble());
00106         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00107             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.get<double>(method));
00108         else
00109             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00110     }
00111     else
00112         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation");
00113 }
